__e: I've got to find out what's on that crystal.
That crystal is the only thing I have left from home...
And I'm not so sure this is a real crystal.
We really should preserve it for posterity, except, it's such good crystal and I'd hate to break up the set.
But I drop this, the crystal shatters and Angel is restored, so whether I live or die your plan has failed.
